module.name: CallerID Managment
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION.The CallerID Management module is a unique way to modify the caller ID that is outpulsed on the fly. By dialing a simple feature code you can change the Caller ID for the next call on your extension. Optionally you can also specify the Persistent field, If this is checked the CID is permanently changed for all future calls for your extension until another feature code is entered to change it
module.changelog: *15.0.16* Packaging of ver 15.0.16 *15.0.15* FREEI-1915 Restoring backup of 14 to 15 completes with General error *15.0.14* FREEI-1279 *15.0.13* FREEI-913 Fix XSS Bootstrap Datatable Issues *15.0.12* bump *15.0.11* FREEPBX-20088 CallerID Management entries flushed while doing backup restore *15.0.10* Fixing FREEPBX-19749 Adding/Editing the caller id entry is not refreshing the page *15.0.9* FREEPBX-19750 Caller ID Management entry initial prefix field value starts with 200 *15.0.8* fixing legacy restore *15.0.7* FREEPBX-19388 Caller ID Management home page contains Submit and Reset button *15.0.6* FREEPBX-18948 Check if we are in edit mode ot create mode. *15.0.5* FREEPBX-17844 Prefix field under CallerID management is not auto incrementing *15.0.4* Packaging of ver 15.0.4 *15.0.3* Fixing FREEPBX-17762 Adding duplicate prefix check *15.0.2* FREEPBX-17762 - Fix issue where you can't insert more than one CID entry *15.0.1* Fork from 13.0.8.10, implement backup
